frontmatter.title: The Mona Lisa according to Giorgio Vasari

metadata.description: presentation of one of the first descriptions of the portrait of Lisa Gherardini, wife of Francesco del Giocondo, known as 'Monna Lisa, la Gioconda' or 'Mona Lisa' written by Giorgio Vasari in 1568.
metadata.keywords: The Joconde, Mona Lisa, Giorgio Vasari, Leonardo Da Vinci
metadata.imageLegend: Portrait of Lisa Gherardini, wife of Francesco del Giocondo, known as «Monna Lisa, the Gioconda» or «the Joconde»
